TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConvertible

summary.span: 定義方法，該方法會將實作參考的值或 實值類型轉換成具有等值的 Common Language Runtime 類型。

span.span: Defines methods that convert the value of the implementing reference or value type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面會提供方法來實作的型別之執行個體的值轉換成通用語言執行階段型別具有相等的值。This interface provides methods to convert the value of an instance of an implementing type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value. Common language runtime 類型是， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The common language runtime types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 如果任何有意義的轉換為 common language runtime 類型，則會擲回特定的介面方法實作。If there is no meaningful conversion to a common language runtime type, then a particular interface method implementation throws . 比方說，如果會實作這個介面，根據布林值類型，實作方法擲回例外狀況，因為沒有任何意義相當於布林值的型別。For example, if this interface is implemented on a Boolean type, the implementation of the method throws an exception because there is no meaningful equivalent to a Boolean type. 通常會公開 common language runtime介面透過類別。The common language runtime typically exposes the interface through the class. Common language runtime 也會使用在明確介面實作中，以簡化用來支援轉換中的程式碼在內部介面類別和基本 common language runtime 類型。The common language runtime also uses the interface internally, in explicit interface implementations, to simplify the code used to support conversions in the class and basic common language runtime types. 除了介面、.NET Framework 提供類別，稱為類型轉換器，將使用者定義資料類型轉換為其他資料型別。In addition to the interface, the .NET Framework provides classes called type converters for converting user-defined data types to other data types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[一般化類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)主題。For more information, see the [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作複數類別，讓它可以轉換為第一個，然後再呼叫靜態成員上的。The following code sample demonstrates an implementation of for a Complex number class, allowing it to be cast first as a and then calling the static members on that . [!code-cpp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CPP/iconvertible.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CS/iconvertible.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/VB/iconvertible.vb#1)]

para.span: 如果您實作介面，您的實作將會自動呼叫方法如果參數是您的實作類型的執行個體和參數是在 common language runtime型別。

span.span: If you implement the interface, your implementation will be called automatically by the method if the parameter is an instance of your implementing type and the parameter is a common language runtime type.

para.span: 類型的參數，大部分的轉換方法都，代表其中一個目前的文化特性 () 或特定文化特性。

span.span: Most conversion methods have a parameter of type that represents either the current culture () or a specific culture.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，基底類型的實作會忽略這個參數。

span.span: For the most part, the implementations of the base types ignore this parameter.

para.span: 不過，您可以選擇是否要在程式碼中使用它。

span.span: However, you can choose whether to use it in your code.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TypeCode GetTypeCode() cil managed
Public Function GetTypeCode () As TypeCode
public: TypeCode GetTypeCode();

span.span: Returns the for this instance.

returns.span: 列舉常數，該常數是實作這個介面的類型或實值型別的 。

span.span: The enumerated constant that is the of the class or value type that implements this interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ToBoolean (IFormatProvider provider);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ToBoolean(class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed
Public Function ToBoolean (provider As IFormatProvider) As Boolean
public: bool ToBoolean(IFormatProvider ^ provider);

param.name: provider
param.span: 介面實作，提供特定文化特性的格式資訊。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的特定文化特性 (Culture) 之格式資訊，將這個執行個體的值轉換為相等的布林 (Boolean) 值。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to an equivalent Boolean value using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 布林值，等於這個執行個體的值。

span.span: A Boolean value equivalent to the value of this instance.
